title: Weekly Digest (2 August, 2020 - 9 August, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 31 issues were created.
Of these, 9 issues have been closed and 22 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #11057 [eip-1193 fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11057), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #11056 [Addition of a Custom RPC for TomoChain on Status](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11056), by [drexit](https://github.com/drexit)
:green_heart: #11055 [Resolve contract from ens name](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11055), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #11054 [Browser stops navigating to URLs after attempt to navigate to  URL starting from // on IOS](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11054), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #11053 [WIP: Test dinamically toggling webview debug](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11053), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #11052 [Blocked card screen isn't shown while trying to perform transaction after card has already been blocked](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11052), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #11050 [WIP: Use topbars form Quo](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11050), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #11048 [Can't change PIN in Keycard settings in Profile if relogin with fingerprint ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11048), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #11047 [Add profile photo](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11047), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #11046 [Add local contact names](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11046), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #11045 [Organization channels in chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11045), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #11044 [Status chat inside dapps](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11044), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #11043 [Account with no password created if double-tap 'Next' button on 'Chose storage' view](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11043), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #11042 [Transaction status for commands in 1-1 chats doesn't update on synced devices](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11042), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #11041 [Hardly visible username on replies in dark mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11041), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #11037 [No conversion for WETH is assests in wallet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11037), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #11035 [Allow choosing to not use a mailserver](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11035), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #11034 [Dialog added to ask permissions for webpage](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11034), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:green_heart: #11033 [Fix text input animations lags](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11033), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #11032 [WIP Add UI for referrals flow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11032), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #11031 [Can't open image/sticker panel view after opening it while chat view was scrolling ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11031), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #11029 [Make installreferrer dependency optional for F-Droid](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11029), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #11051 [nix: add missing args to gcroots.sh script](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11051), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #11049 [Regression e2e fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11049), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #11040 [Home show search when input is focused or has content](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11040), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #11039 [Show gfycat in new chat search](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11039), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #11038 [Fix ens name hash exception for bad names](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11038), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #11036 [Fix GitHub releases](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11036), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #11030 [upgrade Gems, Fastlane from 2.146.1 to 2.154.0](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11030), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #11028 [Switch to WebView version that doesn't silently grant camera permission](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11028), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:heart: #11027 [Add the 3w Anonymous Name if inserting a chat key in New Chat dialogue](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11027), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #11039 [Show gfycat in new chat search](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11039), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
It received :+1: x1, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x1.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #11033 [Fix text input animations lags](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11033), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
It received 12 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 22 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 13 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #11057 [eip-1193 fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11057), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #11055 [Resolve contract from ens name](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11055), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #11053 [WIP: Test dinamically toggling webview debug](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11053), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #11050 [WIP: Use topbars form Quo](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11050), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #11034 [Dialog added to ask permissions for webpage](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11034), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:yellow_heart: #11033 [Fix text input animations lags](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11033), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #11032 [WIP Add UI for referrals flow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11032), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #11016 [replace camera library](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11016), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #11014 [Add universal qr scanner](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11014), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #11007 [[#9986] Allow to disable fetching of tx history on mobile network](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11007), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #10953 [Mentions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10953), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:yellow_heart: #10936 [Nim-Status: iOS support](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10936), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #10923 [fix tokens validation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10923), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 9 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #11051 [nix: add missing args to gcroots.sh script](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11051), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #11049 [Regression e2e fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11049), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #11040 [Home show search when input is focused or has content](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11040), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #11039 [Show gfycat in new chat search](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11039), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #11038 [Fix ens name hash exception for bad names](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11038), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #11036 [Fix GitHub releases](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11036), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #11030 [upgrade Gems, Fastlane from 2.146.1 to 2.154.0](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11030), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #11028 [Switch to WebView version that doesn't silently grant camera permission](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11028), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:purple_heart: #10620 [Add referral share link ui](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10620), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 13 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: add missing args to gcroots.sh script  This should fix the following error showing up on MacOS: ``` error: assertion ((__lessThan  0)  ((builtins).stringLength  watchmanSockPath)) failed at /Users/jenkins/repos/status-react/nix/mobile/android/watchman.nix:8:9 ``` Which was caused by flags like `--argstr` not being passed.  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/68722340c96713a19dae1e10972c3c302d3c6a38) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: add --console=plain to gradle call  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f904d7b543c95e3fe8cba4d3e38c44974c942777) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [jenkin: fix GitHub releases  Specifically filenames and the diff link.  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7a80eca73c73f13a7afbbc51ab329a90cf04f0f4) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: simplify build of gomobile  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/2161192e7611ae9c418efe9f78476596b32706f4) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Home show search when input is focused or has content  Fixes #11017  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/0319854e83dda4f76826c41ba34bae52459b0f7a) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [regression e2e fix  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/dd67533ecd46a85d4233158bcd28f5388cbfd392) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Show gfycat in new chat search  fixes #11027  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/2371dcbc6053bef8032d37a43abbcf27aafca874) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix ens name hash exception for bad names  Fixes #11022  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/72726e2b0b30ec1886ad98ba91ec9cce66e2e77a) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [jenkins: increase iOS build timeout to 25 minutes  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/95997530c6d1d22e205c62a6e0ba5e63bc140ebe) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [upgrade Gems, Fastlane from 2.146.1 to 2.154.0  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7c0488372df251ca07b6065b599388c5a7e6f40e) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [1.5.0](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3419dc3cbe39a62d0940b0275b1315a7121d36b4) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Switched to updated version of WebView that asks for permissions  Signed-off-by: Volodymyr Kozieiev <vkjr.sp@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d5015e4d257217b3afed7c0d1d39e5b3fcc8ae5d) by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add referral program under feature flag  Add acquisition backend methods  Init referrals sharing UI  Add invite on home screen  Use i18n for strings  Lint  Update status go  Pull acquisition contract to get SNT amount  Use new invite component  f pulling  go  Use screen instead of bottom sheet  Handle android install referrer  Post referrer to backend if present  go go  Add async storage for referral decisions  Update with the stage backend  Update contract methods  Modal  UI  Full handling of advertiser type  UI  test  UI  Handle with universal link  Allow multiple acquisition per installation  Fix android bottom sheet  Do not call service if no click-id received  Disable invite in release  Parse query params for referrer  Adapt UI changes  Add push notification  update deps  Mock react-native-push-notification  Request push notifications permission on press accept  Store transaction to local storage and load it back on login  Separate acquisition into smaller ns  Add chat invite  Get referrer only on first install  fix string  Fix firebase crash  Handle outdate click-id  Cleanup business logic  Update contract  Revert pn  Minor update to advertiser modal copy  OLD -  Welcome to Status! Here is some crypto to get you started NEW - Here’s some crypto to get you started! Use it to get stickers, an ENS name and try dapps  OLD - By accepting you agree to the starter pack NEW - By accepting you agree to the referral program  upgrade status-go  Add mainnet  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3c42360b30c734535472df025a955bc8865c969d) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

# RELEASES
Last week there were no releases.
